# Problem 15.2 - Buckling & Yield - Euler's Formula {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A W14 x 34 beam is used as a column that is pinned at both ends. If length L = 30 ft and the elastic modulus E = 280 x 10<sup>6</sup> psi, determine the critical stress for the column.
